#summary Domain model samples

= Introduction =

This page contains a number of sample albums which have been modeled in the domain model. The purpose of this page is just to illustrate how different kind of albums should be represented.

The reference domain model which should be used when creating the samples is found on the [DatabaseModel] page

= Domain model samples =
== Compilation album ==
*The Bodyguard (Original Soundtrack Album)*
References:
  * http://www.discogs.com/master/61126
  * http://www.discogs.com/Various-The-Bodyguard-Original-Soundtrack-Album/release/1794218

=== The Bodyguard (with complete meta data) ===
Note! Only 4 tracks has been modeled of the complete album.
[http://socialmusicdiscovery.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/DatabaseModel/sample_%20The%20Bodyguard.png]
=== The Bodyguard (with limited meta data) ===
Note! Only 4 tracks has been modeled of the complete album. This model illustrates how this album could be represented if you only have access to meta data typically found in tags, such as ARTIST, ALBUM, TITLE, TRACKNUMBER, YEAR
[http://socialmusicdiscovery.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/DatabaseModel/sample_%20The%20Bodyguard%20brief.png]

== Stray Song (single track without reference to Release) ==
A typical "one hit wonder" or "download hit". Song can be found in several releases, typically various compilations, but these are of secondary (or no) interest.
